title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Introducing Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, the ultimate choice for all your writing needs! This pack of 30 pre-sharpened pencils features an exclusive #2 graphite formula for smooth performance and thick cores that deliver consistent lines every time. The premium wood is responsibly sourced and coated in a stunning golden yellow lacquer with a matte finish.

Not only are these pencils top-notch in quality, but they also come with a latex-free eraser that removes marks completely without smudging. The signature green & gold ferrule adds a touch of elegance to these already exceptional pencils. Plus, they are PMA certified non-toxic, making them safe for all users.

With over 100 years of tradition, the Ticonderoga brand is trusted by teachers and students alike. Don't settle for anything less than the best - choose Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils for a writing experience like no other!

Experience the tradition of quality with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils! This pack of 30 pre-sharpened pencils features an exclusive #2 graphite formula for smooth performance and consistent lines. The thick graphite core is complemented by premium wood harvested from responsibly managed forests, making each pencil a sustainable choice. The golden yellow lacquered finish adds a touch of elegance, while the latex-free eraser ensures marks are removed completely without smudging. PMA certified non-toxic for peace of mind. Trusted by teachers and part of the Dixon Ticonderoga family with over 100 years of craftsmanship. Upgrade your writing experience with Ticonderoga!

Experience the tradition of quality with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils. This pack of 30 pre-sharpened, #2 HB soft pencils is perfect for all your writing and drawing needs. The exclusive graphite formula ensures smooth performance, while the thick core delivers consistent lines every time. Made from premium wood harvested from responsibly managed forests, these pencils feature a golden yellow lacquered finish that is both elegant and durable. The latex-free eraser removes marks completely without smudging, and the signature green and gold ferrule adds a touch of style. PMA certified non-toxic, these pencils are preferred by teachers for their high quality craftsmanship and over 100 years of tradition. Elevate your writing experience with Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils.

Trust in the 100 years of craftsmanship from Ticonderoga, a brand preferred by teachers. Upgrade your pencil game with this 30-count pack today.
